EmailTemplate.subject: Corian® Solid Surface: Quotation request for repair (Case: {!Case.CaseNumber}).
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear QN Industrial Partner, In reference to our complaint {!Case.CaseNumber} dated {!Case.Date_Entered__c}, we would like to receive from you a detailed price offer for the repair of problem description at end consumer:
{!Case.Contact} {!Account.BillingAddress} {!Account.BillingCity} {!Contact.Phone} {!Case.Description}
Please list in detail mileage and labour costs involved (price/hour) and indicate whether you need material to be sent out of our warehouse.
Enclosed you will find a picture of the top/problem illustrating the problem together with complete customer data.
Upon receipt of your offer, we will send you our confirmation together with customer’s satisfaction form as well as invoicing information.
Should you have any further questions, do not hesitate to contact us.
Kind Regards,
{!Case.OwnerFullName}<?xml:namespace prefix = o />
QN & Warranty Assistant
Tel: {!Case.OwnerPhone}
{!Case.OwnerEmail}
